ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Bard Quiz
ygData.msgSnippet: 17 too, I missed the Safe Fall question and I am pretty sure the Skyshrine question.  The other I dunno, but the correct answer to that weapons quest IS
ygData.messageBody:
17 too, I missed the Safe Fall question and I am pretty sure the Skyshrine
question. The other I dunno, but the correct answer to that weapons quest
IS archery. I mean we CAN use 2h blunt, not sure if they scored me wrong
there. If not it was probably the Deity question I missed.

Shada Iceheart [Retired]
<Afterlife>


> 17 here...
>
> I've only been to skyshrine once so i'm sure I got that one wrong.
>
> Reguarding the weapons skill, well we don't use bows and our
> weapons cap at
> 1 skill point in 2h weapons, kind of screwy question.
>
> Minkin
